attributes.action: Encourage UK businesses (especially SMEs) to use ecommerce.
attributes.additional_details:
One in three UK small businesses see e-commerce channels as a threat to their business, according to a new study by the Epson Business Council.
Only 59 per cent of UK small businesses see e-commerce channels as a business opportunity, compared with 72 per cent of small businesses across europe. In Italy 94 percent of SMEs have e-commerce.
